snippet: People like me who suffer from depression need to be kept safe from ourselves. I don’t want a gun in my house.
abstract: Op-Ed article by former speechwriter Wendy Button, who suffers from clinical depression, recounts her own urge to buy a gun; calls for far stricter regulations on gun ownership, especially in cases of those with mental illness.
lead_paragraph: People like me who suffer from depression need to be kept safe from ourselves. I don’t want a gun in my house.

headline.main: Please Take Away My Right to a Gun
headline.print_headline: Please Take Away My Right to a Gun
